titlestmt.titleproper:
Guide to the Fales Library Events Video Collection
1990-2011
MSS 307
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Ashley Todd, Esti Brennan, Brent Phillips, 2011.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2013-08-16T15:16-0400

did.unittitle: Fales Library Events Video Collection

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The Fales Library Events Video Collection contains video and audio of events either arranged by or held at the Fales Library relating to the Fales Library, Fales archival collections and/or the Fales Food Studies Series.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is divided into two series:

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open to researchers. Appointments are necessary for the use of manuscript and archival collections.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Collection use is subject to all copyright laws. Permission to publish materials must be obtained in writing from the Director of Fales Library and Special Collections. Please contact fales.library@nyu.edu. or call 212 998 2596.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p:
Published citations should take the following form:
Identification of item, date (if known); Fales Library Events Video Collection; MSS 307; box number; folder number; Fales Library and Special Collections, New York University Libraries.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection contains video and audio of events either arranged by or held at Fales Library.
